name: Rest and Digest Response

surface_layer.definition: A state of the body characterized by relaxation, digestion, and energy conservation.

deep_layer.mechanism: Involves slowing heart rate, increasing digestive activity, and promoting energy storage.
deep_layer.origin: Response to reduced stress or increased food intake.

instance_layer: Digestion of food after a meal

epistemic_metadata.source: US7616990B2 - Implantable and rechargeable neural stimulator - https://patents.google.com/patent/US7616990B2/en
